/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive view.
